verses.verse: The beginning<WG746> of the gospel<WG2098> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316>;

As<WG5613> it is written<WG1125> in<WG1722> the prophets<WG4396>, Behold<WG2400>, I<WG1473> send<WG649> my<WG3450> messenger<WG32> before<WG4253> thy<WG4675> face<WG4383>, which<WG3739> shall prepare<WG2680> thy<WG4675> way<WG3598> before<WG1715> thee<WG4675>.
The voice<WG5456> of one crying<WG994> in<WG1722> the wilderness<WG2048>, Prepare ye<WG2090> the way<WG3598> of the Lord<WG2962>, make<WG4160> his<WG846> paths<WG5147> straight<WG2117>.
John<WG2491> did<WG1096> baptize<WG907> in<WG1722> the wilderness<WG2048>, and<WG2532> preach<WG2784> the baptism<WG908> of repentance<WG3341> for<WG1519> the remission<WG859> of sins<WG266>.

And<WG2532> there went out<WG1607> unto<WG4314> him<WG846> all<WG3956> the land<WG5561> of Judaea<WG2449>, and<WG2532> they of Jerusalem<WG2415>, and<WG2532> were<WG907> all<WG3956> baptized<WG907> of<WG5259> him<WG846> in<WG1722> the river<WG4215> of Jordan<WG2446>, confessing<WG1843> their<WG846> sins<WG266>.

And<WG1161> John<WG2491> was<WG2258> clothed<WG1746> with camel's<WG2574> hair<WG2359>, and<WG2532> with a girdle<WG2223> of a skin<WG1193> about<WG4012> his<WG846> loins<WG3751>; and<WG2532> he did eat<WG2068> locusts<WG200> and<WG2532> wild<WG66> honey<WG3192>;

And<WG2532> preached<WG2784>, saying<WG3004>, There cometh<WG2064> one mightier than<WG2478> I<WG3450> after<WG3694> me<WG3450>, the latchet<WG2438> of whose<WG3739> shoes<WG846><WG5266> I am<WG1510> not<WG3756> worthy<WG2425> to stoop down<WG2955> and unloose<WG3089>.
I<WG1473> indeed<WG3303> have baptized<WG907> you<WG5209> with<WG1722> water<WG5204>: but<WG1161> he<WG846> shall baptize<WG907> you<WG5209> with<WG1722> the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151>.

And<WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096> in<WG1722> those<WG1565> days<WG2250>, that Jesus<WG2424> came<WG2064> from<WG575> Nazareth<WG3478> of Galilee<WG1056>, and<WG2532> was baptized<WG907> of<WG5259> John<WG2491> in<WG1519> Jordan<WG2446>.

And<WG2532> straightway<WG2112> coming up<WG305> out of<WG575> the water<WG5204>, he saw<WG1492> the heavens<WG3772> opened<WG4977>, and<WG2532> the Spirit<WG4151> like<WG5616> a dove<WG4058> descending<WG2597> upon<WG1909> him<WG846>:
And<WG2532> there came<WG1096> a voice<WG5456> from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772>, saying, Thou<WG4771> art<WG1488> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> Son<WG5207>, in<WG1722> whom<WG3739> I am well pleased<WG2106>.
And<WG2532> immediately<WG2117> the Spirit<WG4151> driveth<WG1544> him<WG846> into<WG1519> the wilderness<WG2048>.

And<WG2532> he was<WG2258> there<WG1563> in<WG1722> the wilderness<WG2048> forty<WG5062> days<WG2250>, tempted<WG3985> of<WG5259> Satan<WG4567>; and<WG2532> was<WG2258> with<WG3326> the wild beasts<WG2342>; and<WG2532> the angels<WG32> ministered<WG1247> unto him<WG846>.

Now<WG1161> after<WG3326> that John<WG2491> was put in prison<WG3860>, Jesus<WG2424> came<WG2064> into<WG1519> Galilee<WG1056>, preaching<WG2784> the gospel<WG2098> of the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316>,

And<WG2532> saying<WG3004><WG3754>, The time <WG2540> is fulfilled <WG4137> , and <WG2532> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> is at hand <WG1448> : repent ye <WG3340> , and <WG2532> believe <WG4100><WG1722> the gospel <WG2098> .

Now<WG1161> as he walked<WG4043> by<WG3844> the sea<WG2281> of Galilee<WG1056>, he saw<WG1492> Simon<WG4613> and<WG2532> Andrew<WG406> his<WG846> brother<WG80> casting<WG906> a net<WG293> into<WG1722> the sea<WG2281>: for<WG1063> they were<WG2258> fishers<WG231>.

And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Come ye <WG1205> after <WG3694> me <WG3450> , and <WG2532> I will make <WG4160> you <WG5209> to become <WG1096> fishers <WG231> of men <WG444> .
And<WG2532> straightway<WG2112> they forsook<WG863> their<WG846> nets<WG1350>, and followed<WG190> him<WG846>.

And<WG2532> when he had gone<WG4260> a little<WG3641> further<WG4260> thence<WG1564>, he saw<WG1492> James<WG2385> the son<WG3588> of Zebedee<WG2199>, and<WG2532> John<WG2491> his<WG846> brother<WG80>, who<WG846> also<WG2532> were in<WG1722> the ship<WG4143> mending<WG2675> their nets<WG1350>.

And<WG2532> straightway<WG2112> he called<WG2564> them<WG846>: and<WG2532> they left<WG863> their<WG846> father<WG3962> Zebedee<WG2199> in<WG1722> the ship<WG4143> with<WG3326> the hired servants<WG3411>, and went<WG565> after<WG3694> him<WG846>.
And<WG2532> they went<WG1531> into<WG1519> Capernaum<WG2584>; and<WG2532> straightway<WG2112> on the sabbath day<WG4521> he entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the synagogue<WG4864>, and taught<WG1321>.

And<WG2532> they were astonished<WG1605> at<WG1909> his<WG846> doctrine<WG1322>: for<WG1063> he taught<WG1321><WG2258> them<WG846> as<WG5613> one that had<WG2192> authority<WG1849>, and<WG2532> not<WG3756> as<WG5613> the scribes<WG1122>.
And<WG2532> there was<WG2258> in<WG1722> their<WG846> synagogue<WG4864> a man<WG444> with<WG1722> an unclean<WG169> spirit<WG4151>; and<WG2532> he cried out<WG349>,

Saying<WG3004>, Let us alone<WG1436>; what<WG5101> have we<WG2254> to do<WG2532> with thee<WG4671>, thou Jesus<WG2424> of Nazareth<WG3479>? art thou come<WG2064> to destroy<WG622> us<WG2248>? I know<WG1492> thee<WG4571> who<WG5101> thou art<WG1488>, the Holy One<WG40> of God<WG2316>.
And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> rebuked<WG2008> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Hold thy peace <WG5392> , and <WG2532> come <WG1831> out of <WG1537> him <WG846> .
And<WG2532> when the unclean<WG169> spirit<WG4151> had torn<WG4682> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456>, he came<WG1831> out of<WG1537> him<WG846>.

And<WG2532> they were<WG2284> all<WG3956> amazed<WG2284>, insomuch that<WG5620> they questioned<WG4802> among<WG4314> themselves<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, What thing<WG5101> is<WG2076> this<WG3778>? what<WG5101> new<WG2537> doctrine<WG1322> is this<WG5124>? for<WG3754> with<WG2596> authority<WG1849> commandeth<WG2004> he even<WG2532> the unclean<WG169> spirits<WG4151>, and<WG2532> they do obey<WG5219> him<WG846>.
And<WG1161> immediately<WG2117> his<WG846> fame<WG189> spread abroad<WG1831> throughout<WG1519> all<WG3650> the region round about<WG4066> Galilee<WG1056>.

And<WG2532> forthwith<WG2112>, when they were come<WG1831> out of<WG1537> the synagogue<WG4864>, they entered<WG2064> into<WG1519> the house<WG3614> of Simon<WG4613> and<WG2532> Andrew<WG406>, with<WG3326> James<WG2385> and<WG2532> John<WG2491>.
But<WG1161> Simon's<WG4613> wife's mother<WG3994> lay<WG2621> sick of a fever<WG4445>, and<WG2532> anon<WG2112> they tell<WG3004> him<WG846> of<WG4012> her<WG846>.

And<WG2532> he came<WG4334> and took<WG2902> her<WG846> by the hand<WG5495>, and lifted<WG1453> her<WG846> up<WG1453>; and<WG2532> immediately<WG2112> the fever<WG4446> left<WG863> her<WG846>, and<WG2532> she ministered<WG1247> unto them<WG846>.

And<WG1161> at<WG1096> even<WG3798>, when<WG3753> the sun<WG2246> did set<WG1416>, they brought<WG5342> unto<WG4314> him<WG846> all<WG3956> that were<WG2192> diseased<WG2560>, and<WG2532> them that were possessed with devils<WG1139>.
And<WG2532> all<WG3650> the city<WG4172> was<WG2258> gathered together<WG1996> at<WG4314> the door<WG2374>.

And<WG2532> he healed<WG2323> many<WG4183> that were<WG2192> sick<WG2560> of divers<WG4164> diseases<WG3554>, and<WG2532> cast out<WG1544> many<WG4183> devils<WG1140>; and<WG2532> suffered<WG863> not<WG3756> the devils<WG1140> to speak<WG2980>, because<WG3754> they knew<WG1492> him<WG846>.

And<WG2532> in the morning<WG4404>, rising up<WG450> a great while<WG3029> before day<WG1773>, he went out<WG1831>, and<WG2532> departed<WG565> into<WG1519> a solitary<WG2048> place<WG5117>, and there<WG2546> prayed<WG4336>.
And<WG2532> Simon<WG4613> and<WG2532> they that were with<WG3326> him<WG846> followed after<WG2614> him<WG846>.
And<WG2532> when they had found<WG2147> him<WG846>, they said<WG3004> unto him<WG846><WG3754>, All<WG3956> men seek<WG2212> for thee<WG4571>.

And<WG2532> he said<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Let us go <WG71> into <WG1519> the next <WG2192> towns <WG2969> , that <WG2443> I may preach <WG2784> there also <WG2546> : for <WG1063> therefore <WG1519><WG5124> came I forth <WG1831> .
And<WG2532> he preached<WG2784><WG2258> in<WG1722> their<WG846> synagogues<WG4864> throughout<WG1519> all<WG3650> Galilee<WG1056>, and<WG2532> cast out<WG1544> devils<WG1140>.

And<WG2532> there came<WG2064> a leper<WG3015> to<WG4314> him<WG846>, beseeching<WG3870> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> kneeling down<WG1120> to him<WG846>, and<WG2532> saying<WG3004> unto him<WG846><WG3754>, If<WG1437> thou wilt<WG2309>, thou canst<WG1410> make<WG2511> me<WG3165> clean<WG2511>.

And<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424>, moved with compassion<WG4697>, put forth<WG1614> his hand<WG5495>, and touched<WG680> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, I will <WG2309> ; be thou clean <WG2511> .
And<WG2532> as soon as he<WG846> had spoken<WG2036>, immediately<WG2112> the leprosy<WG3014> departed<WG565> from<WG575> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> he was cleansed<WG2511>.
And<WG2532> he straitly charged<WG1690> him<WG846>, and forthwith<WG2112> sent<WG1544> him<WG846> away<WG1544>;

And<WG2532> saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, See <WG3708> thou say <WG2036> nothing <WG3367> to any man <WG3367> : but <WG235> go thy way <WG5217> , shew <WG1166> thyself <WG4572> to the priest <WG2409> , and <WG2532> offer <WG4374> for <WG4012> thy <WG4675> cleansing <WG2512> those things <WG3739> which Moses <WG3475> commanded <WG4367> , for <WG1519> a testimony <WG3142> unto them <WG846> .

But<WG1161> he went out<WG1831>, and began<WG756> to publish<WG2784> it much<WG4183>, and<WG2532> to blaze abroad<WG1310> the matter<WG3056>, insomuch that<WG5620> Jesus<WG846> could<WG1410> no more<WG3371> openly<WG5320> enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> the city<WG4172>, but<WG235> was<WG2258> without<WG1854> in<WG1722> desert<WG2048> places<WG5117>: and<WG2532> they came<WG2064> to<WG4314> him<WG846> from every quarter<WG3836>.
